item.description: Textbooks Robert. Bayesian Choice. Berger. Geyer. http://www.mcmchandbook.net/HandbookChapter1.pdf Week 1 BDA, Chapter 1 Review probability. This Probability Resource is a good resource. Review R. See R for Data Science. Frank Harrell, “My Journey From Frequentist to Bayesian Statistics”. Frequentism and Bayesianism: A Practical Introduction The Bayesian New Statistics: Hypothesis testing, estimation, meta-analysis, and power analysis from a Bayesian perspective Clark, Michael Bayesian Basics A quick overview of Bayesian inference using regression, Stan, and including model checking.
